description:
Light enough for long climbs, strong enough to withstand serious pedaling power and dependable enough for endurance and adventure riding. The Candy 7 is a competition-oriented pedal with integrated traction pad for refined fit, feel and power transfer.

  • Designed for cyclocross, xc, trail and all-mountain riding, with chamfered edges to reduce rock-strikes
  • Body is 6061-T6 aluminum, ribbed for better traction when unclipped
  • Wing is stainless steel
  • Spindle is 435 chromoly
  • Double-lip internal seal and external seal keep out water and debris to extend pedal life
  • Inner glide bearings perform in adverse conditions
  • Enduro cartridge bearing has great corrosion resistance and superior tolerance
  • Includes premium brass cleats with shims
  • Release angle is 15 or 20 degrees
  • Polyurethane traction pad lets you customize the shoe/pedal interface
  • Hex alloy endcap and bashguard
name: Crankbrothers Candy 7 Pedals
